com.google.gwt.dev.util
Class Name.SourceName

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.util.Name.SourceName
Enclosing class:
Name
public static class Name.SourceName
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a Java class name in source form, for example: org.example.Foo.Bar. See "http://java.sun.com/docs/books/jvms/second_edition/html/Concepts.doc.html#20207"

Method Detail

getInnerClassName

public static java.lang.String getInnerClassName(java.lang.String outerClassSourceName,
                                                 java.lang.String innerClassShortName)
Construct the fully qualified name of an inner class.

Parameters:
outerClassSourceName - source name of outer class, ie org.test.Foo
innerClassShortName - short name of inner class, ie Bar
Returns:
fully qualified source name of the inner class
